title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
OB: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is displayed on the report page. The error message states that there are errors in the table filter and provides details about the data conversion error.
EB: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, the filter should work without any errors. No data conversion error message should be displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column. 2. Insert a table in the report. 3. Create a filter based on the datetime column. 4. For value1 in the filter, input new Date('3/2/2005').
